    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static LenskitConfiguration load(groovy.lang.Closure<?> block)
                                 throws RecommenderConfigurationException
        Load a LensKit configuration from a Groovy closure. This is useful for using the Groovy DSL in unit tests.
        Parameters:
        block - The block to evaluate. This block will be evaluated with a delegate providing the LensKit DSL and the Closure.DELEGATE_FIRST resolution strategy.
        Returns:
        The LensKit configuration.
        Throws:
        RecommenderConfigurationException
        See Also:
        ConfigurationLoader.load(groovy.lang.Closure)

      • load

        @Deprecated
public static LenskitConfiguration load(java.lang.String script)
                                             throws RecommenderConfigurationException
        Deprecated. Loading from Groovy source strings is confusing.
        Load a LensKit configuration from a script (as a string).
        Parameters:
        script - The script source text to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The LensKit configuration.
        Throws:
        RecommenderConfigurationException

      • load

        public static LenskitConfiguration load(java.io.File script)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        RecommenderConfigurationException
        Load a LensKit configuration from a script file.
        Parameters:
        script - The script source file to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The LensKit configuration.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RecommenderConfigurationException

      • load

        public static LenskitConfiguration load(java.net.URL script)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        RecommenderConfigurationException
        Load a LensKit configuration from a script URL.
        Parameters:
        script - The script source URL to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The LensKit configuration.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RecommenderConfigurationException

      • configure

        public static void configure(LenskitConfiguration config,
                             @Nonnull
                             groovy.lang.Closure<?> block)
                      throws RecommenderConfigurationException
        Modify a configuration from a closure. The class loader is not really consulted in this case.
        Parameters:
        block - The block to evaluate. This block will be evaluated with a delegate providing the LensKit DSL and the Closure.DELEGATE_FIRST resolution strategy.
        Throws:
        RecommenderConfigurationException
